__e: Thank you for agreeing to come talk to us.
Which is why he's agreed to start seeing you twice a week.
It's good of you to agree to do this so soon.
Your father and I are agreeing to make this work and I have agreed to trust you again, so good night.
Put a little caffeine in her, a little conversation, and she was willing to come in and do the right thing.
Actually, you are not. I spoke with him, and since what you did at the hospital had nothing to do with drugs, he's agreed to give you another chance.
When I agreed to help Starfleet, I was convinced it was the right thing to do.
Well, if you no longer have political interests, why did you agree to an audience?
And I agreed to go with her to a restaurant at the end of the day.
And I said yes to my mother's plan.
And besides, I know that my father and mother... have now given their consent to our marriage.
I have done nothing but act in good faith to stop the war between our Houses... offering my niece's hand in marriage to a family that has caused us nothing but heartbreak.
And I acceded to your plea to perform an errand there yesterday, and the day before, and every day of my short time here.
Er well, the truth is... when I agreed to the story about the letter being intended for you and... not for Arthur well y... you see... the truth is... the truth is...
Okay, I agreed to dinner, But I never said anything about Sue being here.
